item.title: CVE-2024-27953|2024-03-13T16:28:08.287Z -- Cool Plugins -- Cryptocurrency Widgets – Price Ticker & Coins List
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Cool Plugins Cryptocurrency Widgets – Price Ticker & Coins List.This issue affects Cryptocurrency Widgets – Price Ticker & Coins List: from n/a through 2.6.8.
